嚃字的基本解释

嚃
tà
囫囵吞咽：“毋嚃羹。”

嚃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》他合切，入合，透。］
亦作“嚺1”。
(1)大口吞食。
(2)衔取。

嚃字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嚃； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页211第29
【廣韻】他合切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】託合切，?音踏。【廣韻】歠也。【集韻】大歠也。【禮·曲禮】無嚃羹。【註】爲不嚼菜。【蔬】人若不嚼菜，含而歠吞之，其欲速而多，又有聲不敬，傷廉也。　又【集韻】吐內切，音退。義同。

嚃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嚃字的起名意思

暂无。

drink
Basic explanation of words
drink
tà
Swallowing roundly: "Don't eat soup."
drink
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" he is close, close and thorough. ]
Also known as "嚺1".
(1) Swallow in a big mouth.
(2) Title take.
drink
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嚃; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: Page 211 29
[Guang Yun] He cuts well [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] supports it and cuts it, and the sound pedal. [Guang Yun] She also. 【Ji Yun】Da Xiao Ye. 【Li·Qu Li】No 嚃嚃嚃. [Note] Do not chew vegetables. [Vegetables] If a person does not chew vegetables, but swallows them, he will have a lot of haste, and he will be disrespectful and hurt Lian.　[Jiyun] vomiting and cutting inside, the sound goes out. The same meaning.
